** 30 說劍第三十

國衰，¶

「孰能說王之意止劍士者，賜之千金。」¶	KR5c0051_010:1b:1:10:1,KR5c0126_030:1a:11:1:1,KR5c0127_095:001a:6:17:2,KR5c0128_030:018a:1:2:3,KR5c0135_030:001a:9:3:3,KR5c0136_018:012a:2:2:14,KR5c0139_032:001b:1:10:4,KR5i0036_005:05p044a:7:6:17

太子乃使人以千金奉莊子。¶	KR2c0021_112:118b:3:9:2,KR2d0023_053:36b:2:10:7,KR3k0012_686:4b:11:7:10,KR3k0012_999:4b:11:7:13707,KR3k0055_376:3b:2:25:5,KR4c0014_023:17a:1:33:57,KR5c0051_010:1b:3:1:1,KR5c0126_030:1a:14:1:2,KR5c0127_095:001a:8:4:2,KR5c0128_030:018a:2:6:3,KR5c0135_030:001a:10:7:3,KR5c0136_018:012a:3:6:14,KR5c0138_010:1b:1:3:1,KR5c0139_032:001b:5:1:4,KR5h0057_007:029b:6:7:33,KR5i0036_005:05p044a:8:4:17

往見太子曰：¶	KR2c0021_112:118b:4:7:2,KR2d0023_053:36b:3:8:7,KR5c0051_010:1b:4:13:1,KR5c0126_030:1a:16:5:2,KR5c0128_030:018a:3:8:3,KR5c0135_030:001b:1:9:4,KR5c0136_018:012a:4:8:14,KR5c0138_010:1b:1:22:1,KR5c0139_032:001b:6:3:4,KR5i0036_005:05p044a:8:23:17
「太子何以教周，¶	KR2c0021_112:118b:4:12:2,KR5c0051_010:1b:5:1:1,KR5c0126_030:1a:17:1:2,KR5c0127_095:001a:9:8:2,KR5c0128_030:018a:3:13:3,KR5c0135_030:001b:1:14:4,KR5c0136_018:012a:4:13:14,KR5c0138_010:1b:2:5:1,KR5c0139_032:001b:6:8:4,KR5h0057_007:029b:7:14:33,KR5i0036_005:05p044a:9:4:17

莊子曰：¶

# src: ZHUANG 30.2.3 Guo Qingfan 1020; Wang Shumin 1220; Fang Yong i34; Chen Guying i12
# dating: 8110
此劍，直之无前，¶	KR5c0126_030:1a:119:1:24
舉之无上，¶	KR5c0126_030:1a:120:1:24
案之无下，¶	KR5c0126_030:1a:121:1:24
運之无旁，¶	KR5c0126_030:1a:122:1:24

# dating: 8110
此劍，直之亦无前，¶	KR5c0126_030:1a:139:1:27
舉之亦无上，¶	KR5c0126_030:1a:140:1:27
案之亦无下，¶	KR5c0126_030:1a:141:1:27
運之亦无旁；¶	KR5c0126_030:1a:142:1:27
上法圓天	KR2d0023_053:38a:7:8:7,KR3k0012_344:5b:2:12:6,KR3k0012_999:5b:2:12:10494,KR3k0058_125:21a:1:29:3,KR5c0051_010:4b:2:8:1,KR5c0126_030:1a:143:1:27,KR5c0127_095:003a:3:2:2,KR5c0128_030:019b:8:1:3,KR5c0135_030:003a:6:3:5,KR5c0136_018:014a:6:7:16,KR5c0139_032:005b:9:14:8,KR5i0036_005:05p045b:8:21:17,KR5i0036_005:05p047b:1:17:17
以順三光，¶	KR2c0021_112:120a:8:12:2,KR2d0023_053:38a:7:12:7,KR3k0012_344:5b:2:16:6,KR3k0012_999:5b:2:16:10494,KR3k0045_037:9a:4:19:3,KR3k0058_125:21a:1:33:3,KR4c0022_019:19b:4:33:6,KR5c0051_010:4b:2:12:1,KR5c0126_030:1a:143:5:27,KR5c0127_095:003a:3:6:2,KR5c0128_030:019b:8:5:3,KR5c0135_030:003a:6:7:5,KR5c0136_018:014a:6:11:16,KR5c0138_010:3b:2:6:1,KR5c0139_032:005b:10:1:8,KR5i0036_005:05p045b:9:1:17

此劍一用，¶	KR3k0004_122:9a:7:21:3,KR3k0011_013:15b:1:5:5,KR3k0011_013:15b:1:41:5,KR3k0012_344:5a:11:13:6,KR3k0012_999:5a:11:13:10494,KR3k0057_041:20b:6:15:307,KR3k0058_125:20b:7:26:3,KR3k0058_125:21a:2:11:3,KR4c0022_019:19b:5:13:6,KR4h0002_035:12a:8:5:3,KR4h0145_018:65b:6:20:173,KR5c0051_010:4a:5:3:1,KR5c0051_010:4b:3:15:1,KR5c0126_030:1a:125:1:24,KR5c0126_030:1a:146:1:28,KR5c0127_095:002b:8:2:2,KR5c0127_095:003a:4:9:2,KR5c0128_030:019b:2:16:3,KR5c0128_030:019b:9:8:3,KR5c0135_030:003a:1:1:5,KR5c0135_030:003a:7:10:5,KR5c0136_018:014a:1:5:16,KR5c0136_018:014a:7:14:16,KR5c0139_032:005a:8:10:7,KR5c0139_032:006a:5:1:8,KR5i0036_005:05p045b:2:6:17,KR5i0036_005:05p045b:9:21:17

此諸侯之劍也。」<pb:KR5c0126_CHANT_030-6a>¶	KR3k0058_125:21a:2:36:3,KR4c0022_019:19b:5:38:6,KR5c0051_010:4b:5:6:1,KR5c0126_030:1a:150:1:28,KR5c0127_095:003a:5:9:2,KR5c0128_030:019b:10:16:3,KR5c0135_030:003a:9:1:5,KR5c0136_018:014a:9:5:16,KR5c0139_032:006a:6:9:8,KR5i0036_005:05p045b:10:22:17,KR5i0036_005:05p047b:4:7:17

莊子曰：¶

於是文王不出宮三月，¶	KR5c0067_004:017a:1:26:25,KR5c0126_030:1a:174:1:33,KR5i0036_005:05p046a:6:15:17,KR6q0152_001:0324b:13:13:275,KR6q0251_006:0322a:18:13:70
